Dear Bill:
I have noted with strong approval the
Alabama ETV Commission’s Petition for Rule
Amendment concerning usage of frequencies
above 890 me. Anything the NAEB can do to
advance this amendment will certainly have
my support.
Cordially,
JCSrbh
cc: Mr. Ray Hurlbert
